text: ivarkal allahvait tavirttu tankal patirikalaiyum, canniyacikalaiyum, maryamutaiya makan masihaiyum, (tankal) katavulkalaka etuttuk kontirukkinranar. Eninum, vanakkattirkuriya ore or iraivanait tavira marrevaraiyum vanankak kutatenre ivarkal anaivarum evappattu irukkinranar. Vanakkattirkuriya iraivan avanait tavira (verevanum) illai. Avarkal inaivaikkum ivarraivittu avan mikavum paricuttamanavan
